achievements.name: Agentic AI Hackathon
details: Secured the top position by developing a robust software solution under tight deadlines.
Designed and built autonomous AI agents to automate trading strategies in response to real-time stock market data and financial news.
Created RESTful APIs for real-time data integration with external services.

summary: Software Engineer with proven expertise in enterprise application development. Proficient in Python and JavaScript with strong knowledge of object-oriented programming and design patterns. Experienced in developing web-based applications and RESTful APIs using modern frameworks. Demonstrated ability to deliver maintainable, reusable code through proper testing and secure coding practices while collaborating effectively in agile environments.

details: Collaborate within an agile team to translate complex business needs into detailed technical specifications and successful implementations.
Develop bespoke AI agents tailored to customer requirements using the proprietary AutomationX platform, a workflow automation tool similar to n8n.

Handle the ongoing maintenance and enhancement of the AutomationX platform, focusing on improving performance and integrating with other applications such as LINE, Google Services, Microsoft Services, etc.
Translated complex business requirements into functional implementations using object-oriented programming
Designed and modified database structures ensuring optimal performance and data integrity
Developed and maintained enterprise applications following established software engineering processes
Created detailed technical specifications and documentation for software components
Performed thorough software testing to ensure quality and compliance with requirements
Capstone Project: Web-Based Enterprise Application for Swine Fat Measurement
Developed a full-stack enterprise application using Python, FastAPI, and Next.js, leveraging Computer Vision to automate the measurement process.
Architected and deployed a scalable, distributed system on a cloud platform, capable of processing high-volume image data in real-time.
